items.question: Will there be a Jujutsu kaisen movie?
items.answer: Yes, a movie for volume 0 (the prequel) has been confirmed, the release date in japan is December 24 2021

items.question: Will there be a season 2 of Jujutsu Kaisen?
items.answer: Yes, Recently they announces a JJK Season 2 which will be airing anywhere from December 2022 to March 2023.

items.question: What days are Jujutsu Kaisen episodes released?
How many episodes does season 1 of Jujutsu Kaisen have?
Is there a prequel to Jujutsu Kaisen?
items.answer: Yes, it is manga volume 0 and focuses on Yuta okkotsu, gojo and the second years. Its situated one year before the main series begins. Its original name was Tokyo Metropolitan Magic Technical School.
